title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 9000.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 9000.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Specified types
or classes of vehicles means any types or classes of vehicles specified by the

Commissioner of Transportation whether defined by the Vehicle and Traffic Law
or described by dimension, carrying capacity, occupancy, design or actual use, or otherwise by such commissioner in orders adopted by him from time to time, and shall include, but not be limited to, express buses, taxis, commercial
vehicles and multiple occupancy vehicles as defined in this Part, and vehicles
holding specified permits or licenses issued by the NYS Department of

Transportation or other governmental entities. (b) Multiple occupancy vehicles means any
vehicle with a driver and one or more other persons, the number of such other
persons shall be as specified by the Commissioner of Transportation in orders
adopted by him from time to time with respect to any highway designated under
this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
9000.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
